    • Method Detail

      • connect

        public void connect(Endpoint endpoint,
           NetworkListener listener,
           Promise<NetworkChannel> promise)
        Description copied from interface: NetworkService
        Establish a network connection.
        Specified by:
        connect in interface NetworkService
        Parameters:
        endpoint - provides information about the host, port, etc. to establish the network connection to.
        listener - a listener that will be notified of network connection related events. The listener will only be used if the network connection is successfully established.
        promise - a promise to complete when the outcome of the network connection attempt is established. If the network connection is successfully established then the Promise.setSuccess(Object) is passed an implementation of NetworkChannel that can be used to send data over the network connection.
